member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorCategory
member.summary: Categorizes PDF-related errors for classification and routing.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorCategory.Validation
member.summary: Validation errors from input data or user input (e.g., invalid file path, malformed PDF).

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorCategory.System
member.summary: System-level errors such as out of memory, thread pool exhaustion, or runtime failures.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorCategory.Security
member.summary: Security-related errors including permission denied, encryption failures, or unauthorized access.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorCategory.IO
member.summary: Input/Output errors such as file not found, disk full, or network failures.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorCategory.Rendering
member.summary: PDF rendering errors from PDFium or graphics subsystem failures.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorCategory.Conversion
member.summary: Conversion errors when transforming PDF documents or manipulating content.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorSeverity
member.summary: Indicates the severity level of an error for prioritization and handling decisions.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorSeverity.Critical
member.summary: Critical errors that prevent the application from functioning (e.g., corrupted state, fatal crashes). Requires immediate attention and typically results in application termination.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorSeverity.Error
member.summary: Error conditions that prevent a specific operation from completing but don't crash the app. User action may be blocked, but the application remains functional.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorSeverity.Warning
member.summary: Warning conditions that indicate potential issues but allow operations to continue. May result in degraded functionality or unexpected behavior.

member.name: F:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorSeverity.Info
member.summary: Informational messages about non-critical issues or expected failure conditions. Used for audit trails and debugging purposes.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.PdfError
member.summary: Represents a structured PDF-related error with categorization and context for AI analysis. Extends FluentResults.Error to provide type-safe error handling with rich metadata.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.PdfError.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the unique error code identifying the specific error condition. Format: {COMPONENT}_{OPERATION}_{CONDITION} (e.g., "PDF_LOAD_FILE_NOT_FOUND").

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.PdfError.Category
member.summary: Gets the error category for classification and routing.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.PdfError.Severity
member.summary: Gets the severity level for prioritization and handling decisions.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.PdfError.Context
member.summary: Gets additional context data specific to this error instance. Used to capture runtime information such as file paths, page numbers, or user actions.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.PdfError.#ctor(System.String,System.String,FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorCategory,FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.ErrorSeverity)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Unique error code identifying the error condition.
Human-readable error message.
Error category for classification.
Severity level for prioritization.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.ErrorHandling.PdfError.WithContext(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds contextual information to the error.
member.param: Context key.
Context value.
member.returns: The current PdfError instance for fluent chaining.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Logging.SerilogConfiguration
member.summary: Configures Serilog with structured logging, file output, and OpenTelemetry integration.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Logging.SerilogConfiguration.CreateLogger
member.summary: Creates and configures a Serilog ILogger instance with JSON file sink and OpenTelemetry sink.
member.returns: Configured ILogger instance ready for use.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Logging.SerilogConfiguration.GetLogPath
member.summary: Gets the log file path, using ApplicationData.LocalFolder when available (MSIX sandbox). Falls back to temp directory for headless testing scenarios.
member.returns: Full path to the log file with rolling date suffix.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Logging.SerilogConfiguration.GetVersion
member.summary: Gets the application version from the executing assembly.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Models.BookmarkNode
member.summary: Represents a single bookmark node in a hierarchical bookmark tree. Bookmarks can have optional page destinations and child bookmarks.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.BookmarkNode.Title
member.summary: Gets the title text of the bookmark.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.BookmarkNode.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets the 1-based page number this bookmark links to. Null if the bookmark has no destination.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.BookmarkNode.X
member.summary: Gets the X coordinate of the destination on the page. Null if no specific location is set.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.BookmarkNode.Y
member.summary: Gets the Y coordinate of the destination on the page. Null if no specific location is set.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.BookmarkNode.Children
member.summary: Gets the list of child bookmarks. Empty list if this bookmark has no children.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Models.BookmarkNode.GetTotalNodeCount
member.summary: Calculates the total number of nodes in this subtree (including this node).
member.returns: Total count of this node plus all descendant nodes.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for DOCX to PDF conversion operations. Provides control over conversion behavior, timeouts, and quality validation.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionOptions.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or initializes the timeout duration for the entire conversion operation. Default is 60 seconds.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionOptions.EnableQualityValidation
member.summary: Gets or initializes a value indicating whether to enable quality validation by comparing output against LibreOffice baseline using SSIM metrics. Default is false. Requires LibreOffice to be installed.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionOptions.TempDirectory
member.summary: Gets or initializes the directory path for temporary files during conversion. If null, uses the system temp directory.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionOptions.PreserveTempFiles
member.summary: Gets or initializes a value indicating whether to preserve temporary files for debugging purposes. Default is false (temp files are cleaned up).

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a DOCX to PDF conversion operation. Contains output path, conversion metrics, and optional quality validation results.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets the full path to the generated PDF file.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult.SourcePath
member.summary: Gets the full path to the source DOCX file.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult.ConversionTime
member.summary: Gets the total time taken for the conversion operation.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult.OutputSizeBytes
member.summary: Gets the size of the output PDF file in bytes.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult.SourceSizeBytes
member.summary: Gets the size of the source DOCX file in bytes.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult.PageCount
member.summary: Gets the estimated page count of the generated PDF. May be null if page counting failed.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult.QualityScore
member.summary: Gets the quality validation score (SSIM) if quality validation was enabled. Range: 0.0 (completely different) to 1.0 (identical). Null if quality validation was not performed.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult.CompletedAt
member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the conversion completed.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionResult.QualityValidationPerformed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether quality validation was performed.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PageRange
member.summary: Represents a range of pages in a PDF document. Pages are 1-based (first page is 1, not 0).

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PageRange.StartPage
member.summary: Gets the starting page number (inclusive, 1-based).

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PageRange.EndPage
member.summary: Gets the ending page number (inclusive, 1-based). For single page ranges, EndPage equals StartPage.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PageRange.PageCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages in this range.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PageRange.IsValid
member.summary: Validates that the page range is valid (positive numbers, StartPage <= EndPage).
member.returns: True if the range is valid, false otherwise.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument
member.summary: Represents a loaded PDF document with its metadata and native handle. Implements IDisposable to ensure proper cleanup of native resources.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument.FilePath
member.summary: Gets the full file path to the PDF document.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument.PageCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages in the PDF document.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument.Handle
member.summary: Gets the native PDFium document handle. This handle is automatically cleaned up when the object is disposed.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument.LoadedAt
member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the document was loaded.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument.FileSizeBytes
member.summary: Gets the file size in bytes.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the native PDFium document handle and associated resources.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfPage
member.summary: Represents metadata about a single PDF page.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfPage.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets the 1-based page number.
member.exception: Thrown when page number is less than 1.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfPage.Width
member.summary: Gets the page width in points (1/72 inch).

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfPage.Height
member.summary: Gets the page height in points (1/72 inch).

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfPage.AspectRatio
member.summary: Gets the aspect ratio of the page (Width / Height).

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport
member.summary: Represents the result of PDF quality validation comparing FluentPDF output against LibreOffice baseline. Contains SSIM (Structural Similarity Index) scores and paths to comparison images.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.AverageSsimScore
member.summary: Gets the average SSIM score across all pages. Range: 0.0 (completely different) to 1.0 (identical). Values above 0.95 typically indicate excellent quality.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.MinimumSsimScore
member.summary: Gets the lowest SSIM score among all pages. Identifies the page with the worst quality match.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.MinimumScorePageNumber
member.summary: Gets the page number (1-based) with the lowest SSIM score.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.LibreOfficePdfPath
member.summary: Gets the full path to the LibreOffice-generated baseline PDF. This file is kept for debugging purposes.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.FluentPdfPath
member.summary: Gets the full path to the FluentPDF-generated PDF that was validated.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.ComparisonImagePages
member.summary: Gets the list of page numbers where comparison images were saved. Only populated for pages with SSIM scores below the threshold.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.ComparisonImagesDirectory
member.summary: Gets the directory path where comparison images are stored. Null if no comparison images were generated.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.TotalPagesCompared
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages that were compared.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.ValidatedAt
member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the validation was performed.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Models.QualityReport.IsQualityAcceptable(System.Double)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the quality meets the specified threshold.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Placeholder
member.summary: Temporary placeholder class for initial project setup. Will be removed when actual domain classes are implemented.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IDocumentEditingService
member.summary: Service contract for PDF document structure manipulation operations. Provides methods for merging, splitting, and optimizing PDF documents using lossless operations. All operations return Result<T> for consistent error handling and support progress reporting and cancellation.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IDocumentEditingService.MergeAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,System.IProgress{System.Double},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Merges multiple PDF documents into a single output file. All source documents are combined in the order provided, preserving page dimensions and quality.
member.param: Paths to PDF files to merge (minimum 2 files required).
Full path where the merged PDF will be saved.
Optional progress reporter for operations (reports percentage 0-100).
Cancellation token to abort the operation.
member.returns: A Result containing the output file path if successful, or a PdfError if the operation failed. Error codes: PDF_FILE_NOT_FOUND, PDF_INVALID_FORMAT, PDF_CORRUPTED, PDF_REQUIRES_PASSWORD, PDF_MERGE_FAILED, PDF_INSUFFICIENT_DISK_SPACE.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IDocumentEditingService.SplitAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.IProgress{System.Double},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Splits a PDF document by extracting specified page ranges into a new document. Page ranges are specified using comma-separated notation (e.g., "1-5, 10, 15-20").
member.param: Path to the PDF file to split.
Page range specification (e.g., "1-5, 10, 15-20"). Pages are 1-based.
Full path where the split PDF will be saved.
Optional progress reporter for operations (reports percentage 0-100).
Cancellation token to abort the operation.
member.returns: A Result containing the output file path if successful, or a PdfError if the operation failed. Error codes: PDF_FILE_NOT_FOUND, PDF_INVALID_FORMAT, PDF_PAGE_INVALID, PDF_SPLIT_FAILED, PDF_VALIDATION_FAILED (for invalid page range syntax).

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IDocumentEditingService.OptimizeAsync(System.String,System.String,FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationOptions,System.IProgress{System.Double},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Optimizes a PDF document to reduce file size through lossless compression and structure optimization. Does NOT recompress images or fonts. Optionally linearizes for fast web viewing.
member.param: Path to the PDF file to optimize.
Full path where the optimized PDF will be saved.
Optimization settings (compression, linearization, etc.).
Optional progress reporter for operations (reports percentage 0-100).
Cancellation token to abort the operation.
member.returns: A Result containing OptimizationResult with metrics if successful, or a PdfError if the operation failed. Error codes: PDF_FILE_NOT_FOUND, PDF_INVALID_FORMAT, PDF_OPTIMIZE_FAILED, PDF_SIZE_INCREASED (warning if optimization increased file size).

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for PDF optimization operations.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationOptions.CompressStreams
member.summary: Compress content streams using lossless compression. Default: true.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationOptions.RemoveUnusedObjects
member.summary: Remove unused objects from the PDF structure. Default: true.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationOptions.DeduplicateResources
member.summary: Deduplicate duplicate resources (fonts, images, etc.). Default: true.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationOptions.Linearize
member.summary: Linearize the PDF for fast web viewing (byte-serving). Default: false. Linearization reorganizes the PDF structure so the first page can be displayed before the entire file downloads.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationOptions.PreserveEncryption
member.summary: Preserve encryption settings from the source document. Default: true. If false, encryption will be removed from the output.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationResult
member.summary: Results and metrics from a PDF optimization operation.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationResult.OutputPath
member.summary: Path to the optimized output file.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationResult.OriginalSize
member.summary: Original file size in bytes.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationResult.OptimizedSize
member.summary: Optimized file size in bytes.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationResult.ReductionPercentage
member.summary: Percentage reduction in file size. Negative if file size increased. Calculated as: 100.0 * (1.0 - OptimizedSize / OriginalSize)

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationResult.WasLinearized
member.summary: Indicates whether the output was linearized for fast web viewing.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Services.OptimizationResult.ProcessingTime
member.summary: Total time taken to perform the optimization.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IDocxConverterService
member.summary: Service contract for complete DOCX to PDF conversion operations. Orchestrates the conversion pipeline: DOCX parsing → HTML rendering → PDF generation. Optionally performs quality validation against LibreOffice baseline. All operations return Result<T> for consistent error handling.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IDocxConverterService.ConvertDocxToPdfAsync(System.String,System.String,FluentPDF.Core.Models.ConversionOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Converts a DOCX document to PDF format with optional quality validation. Orchestrates: file validation → Mammoth parsing → WebView2 rendering → validation → cleanup.
member.param: Full path to the source DOCX file.
Full path where the PDF file will be saved.
Optional conversion settings. Uses defaults if null.
Cancellation token for async operation.
member.returns: A Result containing ConversionResult with metrics if successful, or a PdfError if the operation failed. Error codes: DOCX_FILE_NOT_FOUND, DOCX_INVALID_FORMAT, OUTPUT_PATH_INVALID, DOCX_PARSE_FAILED, HTML_TO_PDF_FAILED, CONVERSION_TIMEOUT, VALIDATION_FAILED.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IDocxParserService
member.summary: Service contract for DOCX document parsing operations. Provides methods to parse DOCX files and extract HTML content with embedded images. All operations return Result<T> for consistent error handling.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IDocxParserService.ParseDocxToHtmlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a DOCX document and converts it to HTML with embedded images. Images are embedded as base64 data URIs for self-contained HTML output.
member.param: Full path to the DOCX file.
member.returns: A Result containing the HTML string if successful, or a PdfError if the operation failed. Error codes: DOCX_FILE_NOT_FOUND, DOCX_INVALID_FORMAT, DOCX_PARSE_FAILED.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IHtmlToPdfService
member.summary: Service contract for HTML to PDF conversion operations. Provides methods to convert HTML content to PDF files using WebView2 rendering engine. All operations return Result<T> for consistent error handling.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IHtmlToPdfService.ConvertHtmlToPdfAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Converts HTML content to a PDF file using the Chromium rendering engine. Supports embedded images, CSS styling, and produces high-quality PDF output.
member.param: The HTML content to convert. Must not be null or empty.
Full path where the PDF file will be saved.
Cancellation token for async operation.
member.returns: A Result containing the output file path if successful, or a PdfError if the operation failed. Error codes: HTML_EMPTY, OUTPUT_PATH_EMPTY, WEBVIEW2_RUNTIME_NOT_FOUND, WEBVIEW2_INIT_FAILED, HTML_TO_PDF_FAILED, CONVERSION_TIMEOUT, CONVERSION_CANCELLED.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IPdfDocumentService
member.summary: Service contract for PDF document loading and management operations. Provides methods to load PDF documents, retrieve page information, and close documents. All operations return Result<T> for consistent error handling.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IPdfDocumentService.LoadDocumentAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a PDF document from the specified file path.
member.param: Full path to the PDF file.
Optional password for encrypted PDFs. Pass null for unencrypted documents.
member.returns: A Result containing the loaded PdfDocument if successful, or a PdfError if the operation failed. Error codes: PDF_FILE_NOT_FOUND, PDF_INVALID_FORMAT, PDF_CORRUPTED, PDF_REQUIRES_PASSWORD, PDF_LOAD_FAILED.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IPdfDocumentService.GetPageInfoAsync(FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets metadata information about a specific page in the PDF document.
member.param: The loaded PDF document.
1-based page number to retrieve information for.
member.returns: A Result containing the PdfPage metadata if successful, or a PdfError if the operation failed. Error codes: PDF_PAGE_INVALID, PDF_PAGE_LOAD_FAILED.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IPdfDocumentService.CloseDocument(FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument)
member.summary: Closes a PDF document and releases all associated resources.
member.param: The PDF document to close.
member.returns: A Result indicating success or failure of the close operation.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IPdfRenderingService
member.summary: Service contract for rendering PDF pages to images.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IPdfRenderingService.RenderPageAsync(FluentPDF.Core.Models.PdfDocument,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Renders a PDF page to an image stream at the specified zoom level and DPI. The stream contains PNG-encoded image data that can be converted to platform-specific image types.
member.param: The PDF document containing the page.
The 1-based page number to render.
The zoom level (1.0 = 100%, 2.0 = 200%, etc.).
The dots per inch for rendering. Default is 96 (standard screen DPI).
member.returns: A result containing a Stream with PNG-encoded image data, or an error if rendering failed.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IQualityValidationService
member.summary: Service contract for PDF quality validation against LibreOffice baseline. Compares FluentPDF-generated PDFs with LibreOffice output using SSIM (Structural Similarity Index). Gracefully handles LibreOffice not being installed by skipping validation.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IQualityValidationService.ValidateQualityAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Validates PDF quality by comparing against LibreOffice baseline conversion. Converts the source DOCX to PDF using LibreOffice, renders both PDFs to images, and calculates SSIM score. Saves comparison images if quality is below threshold.
member.param: Full path to the source DOCX file.
Full path to the FluentPDF-generated PDF file.
SSIM threshold below which comparison images are saved (default 0.95).
Cancellation token for async operation.
member.returns: A Result containing QualityReport with SSIM score and comparison paths if successful, or a PdfError if validation failed. Returns null QualityReport if LibreOffice is not installed (graceful degradation). Error codes: LIBREOFFICE_CONVERSION_FAILED, PDF_RENDERING_FAILED, SSIM_CALCULATION_FAILED.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.IQualityValidationService.IsLibreOfficeAvailableAsync
member.summary: Checks if LibreOffice is installed and available for quality validation.
member.returns: True if LibreOffice is detected and functional, false otherwise.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.ITelemetryService
member.summary: Provides telemetry tracking capabilities for events and exceptions.
member.remarks: This abstraction enables application insights, diagnostics, and usage analytics. Implementations should track events, exceptions, and custom metrics for observability.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.ITelemetryService.TrackEvent(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Tracks a custom event with optional properties.
member.param: The name of the event to track.
Optional dictionary of custom properties associated with the event.
member.remarks: Use this method to track user actions, feature usage, or application state changes. Properties are structured data that can be queried and aggregated in telemetry systems.
member.exception: Thrown when eventName is empty or whitespace.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.ITelemetryService.TrackException(System.Exception,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Tracks an exception with optional properties.
member.param: The exception to track.
Optional dictionary of custom properties associated with the exception.
member.remarks: Use this method to track exceptions for error monitoring and diagnostics. Properties can include context such as user ID, operation ID, or component name.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Services.TelemetryService
member.summary: Default implementation of ITelemetryService using structured logging.
member.remarks: This implementation logs telemetry events to the configured ILogger. Future implementations can send data to Application Insights, OpenTelemetry, or other platforms. For now, events are logged to Debug output and structured logs for analysis.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Services.TelemetryService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{FluentPDF.Core.Services.TelemetryService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Logger for telemetry events.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Utilities.PageRangeParser
member.summary: Utility for parsing page range strings into structured PageRange objects. Supports formats like "1-5", "10", "1-5, 10, 15-20".

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Utilities.PageRangeParser.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a page range string into a list of PageRange objects.
member.param: Page range specification using comma-separated values. Examples: "1-5", "10", "1-5, 10, 15-20", "1-3,7,10-15" Whitespace is ignored. Pages are 1-based.
member.returns: A Result containing a list of PageRange objects if successful, or a PdfError with ErrorCategory.Validation if the format is invalid.
member.remarks:
Valid formats: - Single page: "5" → [(5,5)] - Range: "1-5" → [(1,5)] - Multiple ranges: "1-5, 10, 15-20" → [(1,5), (10,10), (15,20)]
Invalid formats return validation errors: - Null or empty string - Negative or zero page numbers - Invalid syntax (missing numbers, extra dashes, etc.) - Reverse ranges where start > end

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Utilities.PageRangeParser.ParseSingleRange(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a single range part (either "5" or "1-5").
